#### Contracting Entity Information
The Correctional Service Canada is seeking a service provider for Volunteer Coordinator Services on Vancouver Island. The contract will be for a period of August 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024, with an option to renew for four additional one-year periods.

#### Description of Services
The service provider will be responsible for coordinating the Vancouver Island Community Corrections Volunteer Program, with a focus on the Community Adult Mentoring and Support (CAMS) Project. They must also provide additional support to offenders with mental health problems and create a group of trained volunteers to work with offenders in the community. The contractor must develop and maintain a schedule of offender activities originating from both the Correctional Service of Canada and contracted agencies within the area.
